# Code of Conduct

We are committed to providing a welcoming and inclusive environment.

## Our Pledge
We pledge to make participation harassment-free for everyone.

## Expected Behavior
- Be respectful and constructive
- Welcome differing viewpoints
- Accept feedback gracefully

## Unacceptable Behavior
- Harassment or discrimination
- Trolling or personal attacks
- Publishing private information

## Enforcement
Project maintainers may take appropriate action for violations.

## Reporting
Report issues to the maintainers via GitHub issues or email.
